title: Target
description: Schema for submitting a target gene.

dbxref.title: External identifiers
dbxref.description: Unique identifiers from external resources (e.g. HGNC, GeneID, UniProtKB or ENSEMBL).

items.title: External identifier
items.description: A unique identifier from external resource (e.g. HGNC, GeneID, UniProtKB or ENSEMBL).
items.comment: Submit as database name:target name (e.g. HGNC:HMFN0395, GeneID:22809)

targeted_genes.title: Targeted genes
targeted_genes.description: List of gene(s) that are targeted by corrsponding assay or antibody.
targeted_genes.comment: See gene.json for available identifiers and details.

items.title: Targeted Gene
items.description: A gene that are targeted by corrsponding assay or antibody.

gene_name.title: Gene name
gene_name.description: HGNC or MGI identifier for the target.
gene_name.comment: Submit only the identifier (e.g. HMFN0395 or 22809).

modification.title: Modification to the corresponding gene.
modification.description: One of the modifications listed in the enum made to the corresponding gene in this target.
modification.comment: This property will be used to calculate the proper label of the target. It is a restricted property and should be a single string describing all modifications (even for cases like multiple tags). See computed_label property for details about automatic label calculation.

label.title: Preferred target label
label.description: An easy to understand label preferred over  computed label.
label.comment: Do not submit. DCC personnel is responsible for submission of this property. In general, the format is the common name of the gene with modification (e.g. H3K4me3, eGFP-E2F1, or POLR2AphosphoS2).

investigated_as.title: Target project investigation context
investigated_as.description: The context(s) the target was investigated in
